timeline.bodyText: Changed this to mongodb.authsource to be consistent with what's in the code and what also is our general convention.
timeline.author: gunnarmorling
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -613,6 +613,10 @@ The following configuration properties are _required_ unless a default value is
 |
 |Password to be used when connecting to MongoDB. This is required only when MongoDB is configured to use authentication.
 
+|`mongodb.authSource`
